content: NEW YORK  April 27 Insurer Molina Healthcare Inc on Thursday said that if the U.S. government does not make promised cost-sharing subsidy payments for Obamacare individual insurance plans  it will drop 650 000 to 700 000 members this year and leave the program in 2018.
